author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

Nightdive returns, bringing a cult 90s shooter from the inestimable Nightdive Studios back, remastered and modernised by the masters of the remaster. John Linneman and Audi Sorlie take a look at this one, explaining why the original game is worthy of the Nightdive treatment and examining the quality of the work. They also answer the crucial question: does the quality of the gameplay itself hold up in the modern era?

Visit the new Digital Foundry website: https://www.digitalfoundry.net

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 - Introduction
02:07 - Remastered Features
03:06 - Beautifully Enhanced Cutscenes
04:45 - Dark Forces Evolved
06:53 - Enhancements
10:52 - What About The Game Itself?
16:23 - Soundtrack is Amazing
17:30 - Ending
title: Outlaws Remaster Review: LucasArts' "Forgotten" FPS Gets The Nightdive Treatment
